extras.name: Affects Corporeal
extras.description: Effect works on corporeal beings with rank equal to extra rank.

extras.name: Affects Insubstantial
extras.description: Effect works on insubstantial beings at half (1 rank) or full (2 ranks) effect.

modifierOptions.name: Partially Affects Insubstantial
modifierOptions.description: The effect works at half its normal rank against insubstantial targets (rounded down).

modifierOptions.name: Fully Affects Insubstantial
modifierOptions.description: The effect functions at its full rank against insubstantial targets.

extras.name: Affects Objects
extras.description: Fortitude resisted effect works on objects.

modifierOptions.name: Affects Only Objects
modifierOptions.description: The effect works on objects but not on living creatures.

modifierOptions.name: Affects Objects
modifierOptions.description: The effect work on objects in the same way as it does on living creatures.

modifierOptions.name: Affects Only Others
modifierOptions.description: The effect affects only others, and not you.

modifierOptions.name: Affects Others
modifierOptions.description: Both you and your subject(s) can use the effect simultaneously.

modifierOptions.name: No Increase in Effectiveness
modifierOptions.description: In the GM’s opinion, there is no real increase in effectiveness, just a change to the resistance.

modifierOptions.name: Lower Resistance
modifierOptions.description: The change is to a generally lower (and therefore more advantageous) resistance.

extras.name: Attack
extras.description: Personal effect works on others as an attack.

extras.name: Contagious
extras.description: Effect works on anyone coming into contact with its target.

extras.name: Dimensional
extras.description: Effect works on targets in other dimensions.

modifierOptions.name: Afects Related Dimensions
modifierOptions.description: Affect any of a related group of dimensions.

modifierOptions.name: Affects Any Dimension
modifierOptions.description: Effect can reach into any other dimension in the setting.

extras.name: Extended Range
extras.description: Doubles ranged effect’s distances per rank.

flaws.name: Activation
flaws.description: Effect requires a move or standard action to activate.

modifierOptions.name: Move Action to Activate
modifierOptions.description: The power requires a move action to activate.

modifierOptions.name: Standard Action to Activate
modifierOptions.description: The power requires a Standard action to activate.

flaws.name: Check Required
flaws.description: Must succeed on a check to use effect.

flaws.name: Diminished Range
flaws.description: Reduces short, medium, and long ranges for the effect.
